titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation commanding all our subiects, being sea-men and ship-wrights, in the seruice of any forreigne Prince or state, to returne home within a certaine time.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: by Robert Barker, printer to the Kings most excellent Maiestie: and by the assignes of Iohn Bill,

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: Greenwich, this fifth day of May, in the tenth yeere of our raigne ... .
Arms 11; Steele notation: most ners 2) carpenters, of.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
